1244250.name: Hypergalactic Psychic Table Tennis 3000 Soundtrack
1244250.description:
Behold! What lies within these zeroes and ones is the legendary soundtrack masterpiece for the greatest table tennis based role playing game of our generation. For a measly few dollars, you can play the sick (fire) beats constructed by the über-famous electronic hip hop music supergroup known as "Ghost Cartridge".

Plus, act now and not only will you gain access to the music used within the Hypergalactic Psychic Table Tennis 3000 video game program, but you will also be granted exclusive access to the music written for at least 6 other Hypergalactic Psychic Table Tennis 3000 games created across alternate universes. That's right! 7 or more universes worth of video game music combined into one delicious and nutritious soundtrack for your ears to dine on with their ear mouths full of listening teeth.
